title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.19 - Consumption of food and/or beverages
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.19 - Consumption of food and/or beverages

State Regulations
(a) No person shall consume food and/or
beverages in any vehicle operated by the NFTA or any subsidiary corporation
which is regularly scheduled and operated solely within the NFTA transportation
district. (b) No person while at a
transportation facility shall consume food and/or beverages in such areas where
appropriate signs have been posted prohibiting such activity. (c) Proof of consumption of food and/or
beverages for medicinal purposes shall be a valid defense to any charge of
violation of this section. Notes

Amended, New

York State Register May 14, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 19, eff. 5/14/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
